POLYGLOT.Languages.title: Languages
POLYGLOT.Languages.hint: Changes the alphabet used for the languages. Reseting to defaults will reload.
POLYGLOT.CustomLanguages.title: Custom Languages
POLYGLOT.CustomLanguages.hint: Define a list of custom, comma separated, languages to add to the system.
POLYGLOT.ComprehendLanguages.title: Comprehend Languages Spell
POLYGLOT.ComprehendLanguages.hint: Set a language whose speaker understands all other languages, but that can't be spoken or written.

directory.name: Custom Font Directory
directory..hint: Set to a folder outside the "modules" folder containing font files.

source.name: Source Type
source..hint: If your fonts are stored in your Forge Assets, select Forge. If they are stored in an S3 bucket, select S3.

POLYGLOT.Truespeech.title: Tongues Spell
POLYGLOT.Truespeech.hint: Set a language whose speaker understands all spoken languages (can't read Journals) and which is understood by all creatures.
POLYGLOT.JournalHighlight.title: Journal Highlight Opacity (%)
POLYGLOT.JournalHighlight.hint: Defines the opacity of the highlight over fonts on the journal.
POLYGLOT.logographicalFontToggle.title: Logographical Fonts
POLYGLOT.logographicalFontToggle.hint: Halves the size of phrases using Logographical fonts (e.g. Japanese, Chinese characters).
POLYGLOT.DefaultLanguage.title: Default Language
POLYGLOT.DefaultLanguage.hint: Name of the default language to select. Keep empty to use system default.
POLYGLOT.ReplaceLanguages.title: Replace System's Languages
POLYGLOT.ReplaceLanguages.hint: Replaces the system's default languages with your Custom Languages. The first language on the list becomes the new default language.
POLYGLOT.ScrambleGM.title: Scramble Messages for GM
POLYGLOT.ScrambleGM.hint: Don't translate the text for the GM (refer to the globe's color for the token's understanding). Requires reload.
POLYGLOT.enableAllFonts.title: Use All Fonts
POLYGLOT.enableAllFonts.hint: Makes the Polyglot fonts available in the Language Settings.
POLYGLOT.RandomizeRunes.title: Randomize Runes
POLYGLOT.RandomizeRunes.hint: This determines which type of RNG is used to generate a phrase. ⚠️ The "None" option only supports Alphanumeric characters (no accents).
POLYGLOT.ExportFonts.title: Make Fonts Available
POLYGLOT.ExportFonts.hint: Make the Polyglot fonts available for use in Foundry (in Drawings for example).
POLYGLOT.DisplayTranslated.title: Display Translations
POLYGLOT.DisplayTranslated.hint: For languages that are translated in the chat window, display the original text and a translation below.
POLYGLOT.HideTranslation.title: Hide Indicators from Players
POLYGLOT.HideTranslation.hint: Hides the Globe and the "Translated from" text from chat messages to players. Perfect for when you don't want to show players which language you are speaking. Requires reload.
POLYGLOT.AllowOOC.title: Scramble OOC Chat Messages
POLYGLOT.AllowOOC.hint: Choose whose users should have their messages scrambled. OOC = Out of Character.

LanguageProvider.name: Language Settings Provider
LanguageProvider.hint: Select who provides language information for alphabets and languages. More language providers can be made available via game systems and installed modules. The options below are dependent upon the language provider selected here. ⚠️ If you change the provider, you have to save and reopen these settings.

LanguageRegex.title: Language RegEx
LanguageRegex.hint: You can use this to change the term searched on items from "Languages" to something else. For example, "Idioma" for Portuguese/Spanish, or "Sprache" for German. This setting is more useful for non-English speakers.

DND5E.SpecialLanguages.title: Replace Special Languages
DND5E.SpecialLanguages.hint: Name of the language that will replace "languages" such as "all the languages it knew in life".
